text: The app is very slow when loading large datasets. Takes 30+ seconds.
Love the new search feature! Much easier to find what I need.
Mobile app crashes when I try to export reports.
Would love to see dark mode support. My eyes hurt after long sessions.
Integration with Salesforce is broken. API returns 500 errors.
Great product but the pricing is too expensive for small teams.
The UI is confusing. Took me 20 minutes to figure out how to create a new project.
Performance has improved a lot since last update. Thanks!
Need better documentation for the API. Current docs are outdated.
Search doesn't work well with special characters. Returns no results.
The app is very slow when loading large datasets. Takes forever.
Would be great to have bulk import from CSV. Currently have to enter data manually.
Security concern: passwords are visible in plain text in the settings page.
Mobile app is not responsive on iPad. Layout is broken.
The navigation is confusing. Can't find the settings page.
API rate limits are too strict. We hit the limit within an hour.
Love the new UI! Much cleaner and easier to use.
App crashes frequently on Android 13.
Need filter options in the dashboard. Too much data to scroll through.
Billing is confusing. Not clear what features are included in each plan.
